title: ShopCaribbeanPools.com E-Commerce Launch
tagline: Digitizing the Early Buy program and modernizing retail sales

context.problem: All sales were handled manually by phone or paper form, resulting in errors, delays, and poor data tracking. Spring rush overwhelmed call center.
constraints: Must integrate with existing CRM and inventory
Need to digitize complex Early Buy program logic
context.quote: We needed to let customers order when it's convenient for them, not just when we're available.

solution.approach: Built WordPress + WooCommerce e-commerce platform with custom Early Buy program logic, CRM integration, branded templates, and mobile-optimized checkout experience.
bullets: Digitized Early Buy program with promotional logic

process.title: Discovery
process.description: Map existing sales process and pain points

process.title: Integration
process.description: Connect CRM, payment processing, and email automation

process.title: Launch
process.description: Deploy and train customer service team

process.title: Optimization
process.description: Monitor analytics and iterate on UX

reflection.learning: E-commerce success isn't just about selling—it's about removing friction. Make the path to purchase obvious and simple.
